pkgmetadata.longdescription: Covariate Balance Tables and Plots // Generate balance tables and plots for covariates of groups preprocessed through matching, weighting or subclassification, for example, using propensity scores. Includes integration with 'MatchIt', 'twang', 'Matching', 'CBPS', and 'ebal' for assessing balance on the output of their preprocessing functions. Users can also specify data for balance assessment not generated through the above packages.
